name: ModPlug Compressed Module
summary: Learn about .MDR files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: ModPlug Player's ability to compress supported modules enables more convenient sharing between users. The application provides a variety of compression formats, which include Zip, LHA, and RAR. ModPlug Player is the only application that supports the MDR format.
NOTE: ModPlug Player was formerly known as ModPlug Tracker.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
